member.name: IDirectManipulationFrameInfoProvider.GetNextFrameInfo
member.summary: Retrieves the composition timing information from the compositor.
member.param: The time, in milliseconds, when the compositor begins constructing the next frame.
The time, in milliseconds, when the compositor finishes composing and drawing the next frame on the screen.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationFrameInfoProvider
member.summary: Represents a time-keeping object that measures the latency of the composition infrastructure used by the application and provides this data to Direct Manipulation.
